content: i designed this variation of a granny square to make a sweater it s a quick and simple three round motif **tools & materials** you can use any yarn weight and corresponding hook size to make this motif but for these instructions see fig 1 i am using a light dk / sport weight yarn in three colours a b & c with a 4mm / g hook **dimensions** 4ply fingering with 3 5mm/e hook 6cm/2 36″ light dk/sport with 4mm/g hook 7cm/2 75 aran/worsted with 5mm/h hook 9cm/3 54″ **pattern formats** downloadable pdf with written instructions includes a chart video instructions available here https //youtu be/qsq6ntpsbok 1 **difficulty ** easy - you ll need to be able to single_crochet chain and double_crochet **make to sell ** you may make these motifs as part of a project to sell either for charity or personal profit if you are a small scale crafter all i ask is that you place the following text credit either in your online listing or on a small piece of paper with the finished item motif design from www mezzacraft com other standard copyright laws apply i love to see people s projects and i encourage you to share the photos of your finished items or wips on instagram using #mezzacraft 1 https //youtu be/qsq6ntpsbok
